- The only potential movements are UP to (17, 36) or DOWN to (19, 36). However, moving DOWN will place the avatar into a wall, which is not a valid move.
- Moving UP to (17, 36) does not encounter any hazards and is a valid move.

Since the avatar cannot move left or right and needs to move either up or down, and DOWN is not an option, the only viable action is to move UP.
